sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘三十七，小餘三百八；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty seven, small remainder three hundred eight;
Large remainder three, small remainder twenty four;
Zhu Li Chi Fen Ruo Di Jie first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘一，小餘二百一十五；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder one, small remainder two hundred fifteen;
Large remainder nine, no small remainder;

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘五十五，小餘五百六十三；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifty five, small remainder five hundred sixty three;
Large remainder fourteen, small remainder eight;
Zhao Yang Shan E third year.

sentences.chinese: 正南十二大餘十九，小餘四百七十；
sentences.literal: South twelve large remainder nineteen, small remainder four hundred seventy;
Large remainder nineteen, small remainder sixteen;
Heng Ai Zhi Xu fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十三，小餘八百一十八；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirteen, small remainder eight hundred eighteen;

sentences.chinese: 大餘二十四，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder twenty four, small remainder twenty four;
Shang Zhang Da Huang Luo Yuan Kang first year.
